{"id":1002440429,"question_id":2892,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"10 months, 3 weeks","timestamp":1690185614,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"2 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1002440429/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Check if Array is Good","memory":"42.2 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public boolean isGood(int[] nums) {\n        Arrays.sort(nums);\n        \n        int len = nums.length;\n        \n        for(int i=0;i<len;i++){\n            \n            if(i==len-1){\n                if(nums[i]!=len-1)\n                    return false;\n            }else\n            \n            \n            if(nums[i]!=i+1)\n                return false;\n        }\n        \n        return true;\n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"check-if-array-is-good","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
